other_tests.findings: Single monoallelic missense mutation (p.R776C) detected, inherited from the unaffected mother.
Compound heterozygosity for a novel nonsense mutation (p.Q235X) and a known missense mutation (p.Y453D).
Bilateral moderate hearing loss, thresholds at 55 dB (right ear) and 50 dB (left).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved to 30 dB (right) and 40 dB (left) at 13 months.
